com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto
Interface IComponentOpDescriptor

public interface IComponentOpDescriptor

DTO which describes an operation to perform upon a component in a workspace.

The component.

Returns:

requiresDetailedReport

boolean requiresDetailedReport()
Returns:
true if the client requires detailed item update reports for this component operation, false otherwise. if false, these item reports will not be calculated.

getReplaceOrAddSeed

IContextHandle getReplaceOrAddSeed()
Returns:
the seed, or null if there is no seed
